column4: i forgot to tick "install 3rd party software" like shown here: http://blog.mypapit.net/2010/10/ubuntu-10-10-maverick-installation-3rd-party-software-and-codecs-automatic-download-feature.html
how can i install it afterwards?
you can install them when you actually need them
like when you open an mp3 by rhymthbox, it will ask you to install the codec or not
